name: Favorite Hero
desc: Equip only to a Level 5 or higher "HERO" monster. While a card is in your Field Zone, the equipped monster gains ATK equal to its original DEF, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can activate 1 Field Spell from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Favorite Hero" once per turn. When the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by its attack: You can send this card to the GY; the monster that attacked can make a second attack in a row.
